thread.title: Csoat Med Bistro+Wine
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Csoat Med Bistro+Wine

author: Csoat Med Bistro+Wine
title: Csoat Med Bistro+Wine
text: As with most companies, the product is not the issue as they will deliver, it is when problems arise or at time of purchase, when a company will do the difference as nowadays customer service is dead; well these people are an exception to this rule, they rock and will get more business from us! Definitely would highly recommend!
